game.title: The Secret Quest
game.description: You have been told of a secret quest to find a hidden treasure deep within the forest. Speak with the old hermit for more information.
game.reward: A chest full of gold and jewels

task.objective: Gather information from the townspeople about the treasure location
task.description: Visit each of the villagers in the nearby town and ask them for any information they might have about the treasure or its location. Be sure to be polite and respectful in your interactions with them.

task.objective: Retrieve the map from the library
task.description: Make your way to the town library and locate the ancient map that will lead you to the treasure. Be careful, as the library is known to be a quiet place and any noise you make may alert the librarian.

Follow the map to the location of the treasure and be prepared for any challenges that may come your way. Remember, the treasure is well guarded and you will need all of your skills and courage to claim it.
